resources.string:
This app is used for widening your vocabulary in quick and fun way! 
 
Rules:
 
1. Clue-givers may not use any taboo words, including abbreviations and any part of the taboo word. 
2. Clue-giver may only use speech to prompt his or her teammates; gestures, sounds (e.g. barking), or drawings are not allowed. 
3. Singing is permitted, provided the singer is singing words rather than humming or whistling a tune. 
3. Clue-givers may pass on any card at any time, but the card is then placed in the discard pile. 
4. Clue-giver may give hints which rhyme with a taboo word, or are an abbreviation of a taboo word. 
5. While the clue-giver is prompting the teammates they may make as many guesses as they want with no penalties for wrong guesses. 
 
Scoring:
 
The playing team receives one point for each correct guess and one penalty point if "taboo" words are spoken.

1.Press play.
 
2.Choose the number of rounds (from 1 to 15).
 
3.Choose the number of seconds per round (from 15 to 130).
 
4.Enter team names, if you do not enter any, the teams will be called Team 1 and Team 2.
 
5.Press play again.
 
6.Have fun!
 
P.S. The difficulty can be changed in the settings!
Unfortunately, not yet available in Play Store ! ! !
